ComicInfo.Title: Universal Law, Book Two: Across the Infinite
ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 2 of the 3-part "Universal Law." Mr. Majestic journeys to the very center of the universe to meet with a secret conclave of super-beings responsible for much more than merely saving the universe. Meanwhile, in Majestic's absence, Desmond is stalked by an unholy being from deep space intent on fulfilling its own primal destiny. It's more adventure off the cosmic charts!
